name: DeleteCatalogObject
description:
Delete a catalog object and its children by ID.

This tool deletes a catalog object in the Squareup catalog using the provided ID. The deletion is cascading, removing all child objects as well. Only one delete request is processed at a time per seller account.

parameters.name: catalog_object_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the catalog object to delete. Deletion is cascading, removing all dependent objects.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the catalog object to be deleted. When an object is deleted, other
objects in the graph that depend on that object will be deleted as well (for example, deleting a
catalog item will delete its catalog item variations).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: object_id
parameters.description:
The ID of the catalog object to be deleted. When an object is deleted, other
objects in the graph that depend on that object will be deleted as well (for example, deleting a
catalog item will delete its catalog item variations).

value_schema.description:
The ID of the catalog object to be deleted. When an object is deleted, other
objects in the graph that depend on that object will be deleted as well (for example, deleting a
catalog item will delete its catalog item variations).

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
